original_text: And the children of Israel carried away captive of their brethren two hundred thousand, women, sons, and daughters, and took also away much spoil from them, and brought the spoil to Samaria.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 형제 중에서 그들의 아내와 자녀를 합하여 이십만 명을 사로잡고 그들의 재물을 많이 노략하여 사마리아로 가져가니

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel carried away captive
of their brethren two hundred thousand
and took also away much spoil from them
and brought the spoil to Samaria
